name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James Melvin SMITH, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James Melvin SMITH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Charles R. Gority, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant.
William J. Haberstroh, Dist. Atty., David C. Gorman, First Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
632 A.2d 306
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James Melvin SMITH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1993.
Decided Nov. 1, 1993.
Charles R. Gority, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant.
William J. Haberstroh, Dist. Atty., David C. Gorman, First Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
